import React from "react"; const Footer = () => { return (
{/* Left: Tagline */}

"Let's get Connected"

{/* Right: Social Media Icons */}
{/* Footer Text */}

© {new Date().getFullYear()} Chowdhury Nafis Faiyaz. All rights reserved.

); }; export default Footer;
